name: guardian-dashboard
description: The dashboard for the guardian discord bot

scripts.compile: tsc && cp -a src/renderer/scripts/. dist/renderer/scripts && cp -a src/renderer/images dist/renderer/images && cp src/renderer/index.html src/renderer/feedback.html src/renderer/statistics.html src/renderer/about.html dist/renderer

author: Racooder <76227605+Racooder@users.noreply.github.com>
